data.description:
Step into a groundbreaking mixed reality combat experience with Guardian of Realms. As the Guardian, you are humanity's last defense against otherworldly warriors and fearsome creatures. Your playspace becomes a battleground where portals open, bringing enemies from another realm into your world. Are you ready to defend it?

Sandbox Mode
Customize your battles in Sandbox Mode, choosing the type, frequency, and difficulty of enemies. Face off against armorless warriors, duel with powerful foes, or battle monstrous beings with fireball attacks. With modifiers like gravity manipulation and chronokinesis, you can create epic, surreal combat scenarios. Plus, with full mod support, the possibilities are endless.

Survival Mode
In Survival Mode, protect a sacred crystal that holds the fate of the realms. Strategically place the crystal in your room and defend it against waves of enemies. Heal it with your hands if it takes damage, but don't let it shatter—or the world is doomed.

Endless Replayability
With mod support and a wide range of customization options, Guardian of Realms offers endless replayability. Every battle is unique, allowing you to create and conquer the most challenging combat scenarios.

Guardian of Realms—Your world, your battlefield. Defend it at all costs.
